title: tedana_wrapper.py
description: Internal wrapper to run tedana.py, typically used within afni_proc.py.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Mask in same space/grid as the input datasets.

results_dir.title: Results Directory
results_dir.description: Folder to be created for all outputs. Default [./Bunnymen].

save_all.title: Save All Flag
save_all.description: Save intermediate datasets. Default is to save only the 3dZcat stacked dataset (and tedana stuff).

prep_only.title: Preparation Only Flag
prep_only.description: Do not run tedana.py, stop at 3dZcat.

tedana_prog.title: Tedana Program
tedana_prog.description: Path and name of the version of tedana.py that will be run. Default is meica.libs/tedana.py in the afni binaries directory.

ted_label.title: Tedana Label
ted_label.description: Suffix for output folder. Adds suffix like TED.LABEL (NOT A PATH).

tedana_opts.title: Tedana Options
tedana_opts.description: Additional options to pass to tedana.py. (In quotes) Example: '--initcost=tanh --conv=2.5e-5'
